entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
